content:
The defeat was carried out by the fighters of a separate airborne Sicheslav brigade.

Video of mass destruction of armored vehiclesPosted on April 1Airborne assault troops of the Armed Forces.

In the Avdeevsky direction, the enemy tried to attack the tank battalion, but received a proper repel.

Якreported by ArmyInform, The forces of defense destroyed two enemy anti-aircraft missile complexes and a long-range gun.
title: Sicheslav paratroopers destroyed four enemy tanks and two BMPs
description: Video of mass destruction of armored vehicles was posted on April 1 by airborne assault troops. ...
author: Army Inform
